question: In which of the following forests Chilauni, Indian chestnut, birch, plum, machilus, cinnamomum, litsea are found?
explanation: Montane Wet Temperate Forests provide a variety of Timber ranging from Deodar, Chilauni, Indian chestnut, birch, plum, machilus, cinnamomum, litsea, magnolia, blue pine, oak, hemlock, etc.
